text: Hello! This might have been mentioned before - if that's the case, sorry for bother. I was wondering if it was possible to implement an option to copy modules with their content between pages. We've encountered situations where the client desires the same content being present in multiple pages - having an option to copy modules including their content would save a lot of time over copying that information by hand each and every time
You should use a global module instead
global modules don’t need to be copied and pasted, they look the same no matter what page they are on

<@U7SL518D6> The problem with global modules is that they are difficult for the client to edit. It requires going into the Design Manager and edit the global settings there. Also there is no quick way to arrive there from the page editor. The interface tooltip says all you need to do is click but nothing happens
I understand, and agree. the other option if the client is scared by the design manager is to use HubDB
Don't mind the client, I am scared of HubDB :smile:
it’s more afraid of you than you are of it
_the last words dad said to me before i was dragged away_
In the DM there is an edit global content button. All they need is to introduce that into the front end.
